Meaning_English: to love; affection; to be fond of; to like

Meaning_English: white; snowy; pure; bright; empty; blank; plain; clear; to make clear; in vain; gratuitous; free of charge; reactionary; anti-communist; funeral; to stare coldly; to write wrong character; to state; to explain; vernacular; spoken lines in opera; surname Bai

Meaning_English: hundred; numerous; all kinds of; surname Bai

Meaning_English: assistance; aid; to help; to assist

Meaning_English: roots or stems of plants; origin; source; this; the current; root; foundation; basis; classifier for books; periodicals; files etc; originally

Meaning_English: (particle used for comparison and -er than); to compare; to contrast; to gesture (with hands); ratio

Meaning_English: to leave; to depart; to separate; to distinguish; to classify; other; another; do not; must not; to pin

Meaning_English: you're welcome; impolite; rude; blunt; don't mention it

Meaning_English: to go out; to come out; to occur; to produce; to go beyond; to rise; to put forth; to happen; classifier for dramas; plays; operas etc

Meaning_English: from; via; passing through; through (a gap); past; ever (followed by negative; meaning never); (formerly pr. zòng and related to 縱|纵) to follow; to comply with; to obey; to join; to engage in; adopting some mode of action or attitude; follower; retainer; accessory; accomplice; related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor; surname Cong

Meaning_English: couple; pair; to be opposite; to oppose; to face; versus; for; to; correct (answer); to answer; to reply; to direct (towards sth); right

Meaning_English: unworthy; to let down; I'm sorry; excuse me; pardon me; if you please; sorry? (please repeat)

人很少。Ít người.
你是谁？Bạn là ai?
身体好吗？Sức khỏe ổn không?
你说什么？Bạn nói gì?
我生病了。Tôi bị bệnh.
生日快乐！Chúc mừng sinh nhật!
十个人。10 người.

Meaning_English: time; length of time; moment; period
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 什么时候？Khi nào?
我没有时间。Tôi không có thời gian.

Meaning_English: is; are; am; yes; to be
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 这是我。Đây là tôi.

Meaning_English: affair; matter; thing; business; CL:件[jiàn];樁|桩[zhuāng]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 什么事情？Chuyện gì vậy?

Meaning_English: wrist watch; CL:塊|块[kuài];隻|只[zhī];個|个[gè]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我的手表。Đồng hồ của tôi.

Meaning_English: cell phone; cellular phone; mobile phone; CL:部[bù]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我的手机没电了。Điện thoại tôi hết pin rồi.

Meaning_English: book; letter; CL:本[běn];冊|册[cè];部[bù]; see also 書經|书经 Book of History
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我买书。Tôi mua sách.

Meaning_English: water; river; liquid; beverage; additional charges or income; (of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我喝水。Tôi uống nước.
我喜欢吃水果。Tôi thích ăn trái cây.

Meaning_English: to go to bed; to go to sleep
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我去睡觉。Tôi đi ngủ.

Meaning_English: to speak; to say; to talk; to gossip; to tell stories; talk; word
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 不要说话。Đừng nói chuyện.
四个人。4 người.

Meaning_English: to deliver; to carry; to give (as a present); to present (with); to see off; to send
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我送你回家。Tôi đưa bạn về.

Meaning_English: classifier for years (of age); year; year (of crop harvests)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我二十岁。Tôi 20 tuổi.
所以我不去了。Cho nên tôi không đi.

Meaning_English: he or him; (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant); (used before sb's name for emphasis); (used as a meaningless mock object); other; another
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 他是老师。Anh ấy là giáo viên.
她很好。Cô ấy rất tốt.
它很可爱。Nó rất dễ thương.
太热了！Nóng quá!
我喜欢踢足球。Tôi thích đá bóng.

Meaning_English: topic; problem for discussion; exam question; subject; to inscribe; to mention; surname Ti; CL:個|个[gè];道[dào]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 这道题很难。Bài này khó.
今天天气很好。Hôm nay thời tiết đẹp.
她喜欢跳舞。Cô ấy thích nhảy.

Meaning_English: to listen; to hear; to obey; a can (loanword from English tin); classifier for canned beverages
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我听音乐。Tôi nghe nhạc.
我是你的同学。Tôi là bạn học của bạn.
外面很冷。Bên ngoài rất lạnh.

Meaning_English: to finish; to be over; whole; complete; entire
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我做完了。Tôi làm xong rồi.

Meaning_English: toy; sth used for amusement; curio or antique (Taiwan pr. wàn); to play; to have fun; to trifle with; to keep sth for entertainment
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我们一起玩吧。Chúng ta cùng chơi nhé.
晚上见。Hẹn gặp tối nay.

Meaning_English: hello (interj.; esp. on telephone); hey; to feed (sb or some animal)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 喂，你好！Alo; xin chào!
为什么不去？Tại sao không đi?
我问你一个问题。Tôi hỏi bạn 1 câu.

Meaning_English: question; problem; issue; topic; CL:個|个[gè]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 这个问题很简单。Câu hỏi này rất dễ.
我是学生。Tôi là học sinh.
我们是朋友。Chúng ta là bạn.
五个人。5 người.
我爱吃西瓜。Tôi thích ăn dưa hấu.

Meaning_English: to wish for; to desire; hope CL:個|个[gè]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我希望你快乐。Tôi hy vọng bạn vui vẻ.
洗衣服。Giặt đồ.

Meaning_English: to like; to be fond of
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我喜欢你。Tôi thích bạn.

Meaning_English: down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 坐下。Ngồi xuống.
下午我工作。Chiều tôi làm việc.
今天下雨。Hôm nay trời mưa.

Meaning_English: teacher; Mister (Mr.); husband; doctor (topolect); CL:個|个[gè];位[wèi]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 王先生。Ông Vương.

Meaning_English: now; at present; at the moment; modern; current; nowadays
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我现在去。Bây giờ tôi đi.

Meaning_English: to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我想你。Tôi nhớ bạn.

Meaning_English: direction; orientation; to face; to turn toward; to; towards; shortly before; formerly; to side with; to be partial to; all along (previously); surname Xiang
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 向左走。Đi về bên trái.
小孩子。Trẻ nhỏ.
小姐，请问… Cô ơi cho hỏi...
一个小时。一 tiếng.
他笑了。Anh ấy cười rồi.
一些东西。Một vài đồ.
我写字。Tôi viết chữ.
谢谢你！Cảm ơn bạn!
新手机。Điện thoại mới.
星期一：thứ hai.

Meaning_English: family name; surname; name; CL:個|个[gè]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 你姓什么？Bạn họ gì?
我需要休息。Tôi cần nghỉ.
我是学生。Tôi là học sinh.
我学习中文。Tôi học tiếng Trung.
我去学校。Tôi đi học.

Meaning_English: snow; snowfall; CL:場|场[cháng]; to have the appearance of snow; to wipe away; off or out; to clean
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 下雪了。Trời có tuyết.
你喜欢什么颜色？Bạn thích màu gì?
她的眼睛很大。Mắt cô ấy rất to.
我不吃羊肉。Tôi không ăn thịt cừu.
吃药。Uống thuốc.
我要这个。Tôi muốn cái này.

Meaning_English: also; too; (in classical Chinese) final particle serving as copula
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我也是。Tôi cũng vậy.

Meaning_English: one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout; one radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 一个人。Một người.
我买衣服。Tôi mua quần áo.
我是医生。Tôi là bác sĩ.
我去医院。Tôi đi bệnh viện.
我已经吃了。Tôi ăn rồi.
椅子在桌子前面。Ghế ở trước bàn.

Meaning_English: in the same place; together; with; altogether (in total)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我们一起去吧。Chúng ta cùng đi nhé.

Meaning_English: idea; opinion; meaning; wish; desire; CL:個|个[gè]
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 什么意思？Nghĩa là gì?

Meaning_English: overcast (weather); cloudy; shady; Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang); negative (electric.); feminine; moon; implicit; hidden; genitalia
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 今天是阴天。Hôm nay trời âm u.

Meaning_English: (located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我在家。Tôi ở nhà.

Meaning_English: because; owing to; on account of
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 因为太远了。Bởi vì quá xa.
我不会游泳。Tôi không biết bơi.

Meaning_English: to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我有钱。Tôi có tiền.

Meaning_English: right side; right; to the right
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 在右边。在 bên phải.
我爱吃鱼。Tôi thích ăn cá.

Meaning_English: Chinese monetary unit; dollar; primary; first; the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (12-13); surname Yuan
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 十元。10 tệ.
太远了！Xa quá!
这个月。Tháng này.

Meaning_English: movement; campaign; CL: 場|场[chǎng]; sports
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我喜欢运动。Tôi thích thể thao.

Meaning_English: again; once more; re-; second; another; then (after sth; and not until then)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 再来一次。Làm lại lần nữa.
再见！Tạm biệt!

Meaning_English: early morning; CL:個|个[gè]; Good morning!
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 早上好！Chào buổi sáng!
怎么做？Làm sao?

Meaning_English: how?; how about?; how was it?; how are things?
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 你觉得怎么样？Bạn thấy thế nào?

Meaning_English: to open up; to spread; sheet of paper; classifier for flat objects; sheet; classifier for votes
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 一张纸。Một tờ giấy.
他是我丈夫。Anh ấy là chồng tôi.

Meaning_English: to try to find; to look for; to call on sb; to find; to seek; to return; to give change
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我找你。Tôi tìm bạn.

Meaning_English: this; these; (commonly pr. zhèi before a classifier; esp. in Beijing)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 这是我的书。Đây là sách của tôi.

Meaning_English: particle attached after verb to indicate action in progress; like -ing ending
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 门开着。Cửa đang mở.

Meaning_English: really; truly; indeed; real; true; genuine
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 真的？Thật sao?

Meaning_English: in the process of (doing something or happening); while (doing)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我正在学习。Tôi đang học.

Meaning_English: to know; to be aware of
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我知道了。Tôi biết rồi.
我在中国。Tôi ở Trung Quốc.
中午吃饭。Ăn trưa.

Meaning_English: to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我住在河内。Tôi sống ở Hà Nội.
我准备好了。Tôi chuẩn bị xong rồi.
桌子上有书。Trên bàn có sách.

Meaning_English: letter; symbol; character; word; CL:個|个[gè]; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 2 in dynastic China
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 写汉字。Viết chữ Hán.
我骑自行车。Tôi đi xe đạp.

Meaning_English: to walk; to go; to run; to move (of vehicle); to visit; to leave; to go away; to die (euph.); from; through; away (in compound verbs; such as 撤走); to change (shape; form; meaning)
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我走了。Tôi đi đây.
最好。Tốt nhất.
我昨天去北京。Hôm qua tôi đi Bắc Kinh.

Meaning_English: left; the left side; to the left of
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 在左边。Ở bên trái.

Meaning_English: to sit; to take a seat; to take (a bus; airplane etc); to bear fruit; surname Zuo
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 请坐。Mời ngồi.

Meaning_English: to do; to make; to produce; to write; to compose; to act as; to engage in; to hold (a party); to be; to become; to function (in some capacity); to serve as; to be used for; to form (a bond or relationship); to pretend; to feign; to act a part; to put on appearance
Cach_dung_trong_cau: 我做饭。Tôi nấu ăn.
